description: A dashboard to visualize application's deployment.

panels.description: CPU usage of pods in a specified namespace
panels.title: CPU Core Usage by $name

panels.description: request rate per minute over last 1 minutes

targets.expr: sum(rate(traces_span_metrics_duration_milliseconds_count{service_name="$name", span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER", http_route=~"$route"}[1m])) by (span_name)

panels.title: Request Rate

panels.description: CPU throttling ratio for each container within a specific application in a Kubernetes namespace.

targets.expr: sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{job="kubelet1", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", pod=~"^$name.*$", container!="", cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (container) /sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{job="kubelet1", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", pod=~"^$name.*$", container!="", cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (container)

panels.title: CPU Throttling

panels.description: by route and http status code

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(le, service_name) (rate(traces_span_metrics_duration_milliseconds_bucket{span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER", service_name="$name", http_route=~"$route"}[1m])))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by(le, service_name) (rate(traces_span_metrics_duration_milliseconds_bucket{span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER", service_name="$name", route=~"$route"}[1m])))
histogram_quantile(0.9, sum by(le, service_name) (rate(traces_span_metrics_duration_milliseconds_bucket{span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER", service_name="$name", route=~"$route"}[1m])))

panels.title: Latency $route

panels.description: it showing the total memory used by pods for a specific deployment.
panels.title: Memory Usage -$name

panels.description: It shows the percentage of successful and unsuccessful HTTP requests for a specific route within an application
panels.title: Success/Error Rate of $route

targets.expr: topk(10,sum(traces_span_metrics_duration_milliseconds_count{service_name="$name"}) by (http_route))

topk(10, (sum(traces_span_metrics_duration_milliseconds_sum{service_name="$name"}) by (http_route))
          /
        (sum(traces_span_metrics_duration_milliseconds_count{service_name="$name"}) by (http_route)))

panels.description: This will give logs of  services  for selected times range

targets.expr: {application_group="$ApplicationGroup", name="$name"} |= `$search` | json | line_format `{{.log}}`

panels.title: Logs

targets.expr: sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor",cluster="$cluster", image!="",container!="",container=~"$container",pod=~"^$name.*$"}[5m])) by (pod, container)

panels.description: It will display traces(max 1000) within the specified time frame that have a duration of more than 150ms.
panels.title: Application Traces

defaults.noValue: No Events in this time range

targets.expr: {k8s_namespace_name="$namespace", service_name="name"} | json | object_regarding_namespace =~ `$namespace` | object_regarding_name =~ `^$application.*$`

title: Observability
